data.text: @HamletHologram Also, she has stuck it out for three years of threats and attempts to (at minimum) injure her on the job, which is actually REALLY FUCKING IMPRESSIVE?
@HamletHologram I have nothing but respect for women that are resisting being forced out because they've reached the age where they stop putting up with everybody's shit.
You've been the leading soprano for two decades, fuck this literal bridge troll coming into your mentions to tell you how to do your job.
